p: In addition, the effects of this course could also be compared to the results of other studies on improving cognition. For example, in one study about children's cognitions of HIV, only 17.85% of children before taking the lesson "Sex Island” (one lesson in this course) answered HIV-related questions correctly, yet from the lesson, children learned that "they would not be infected with HIV if they ate, hugged or swam with HIV carriers” in the lesson ( 21).
